website_summaries.verdict: With users raving about the quality and stylish appeal of these bulbs, they are an ideal choice for those looking for versatile vintage style lighting.
pros: These bulbs stand out for offering plenty of light without being overly bright, and users liked their warm amber glow
We love that this brand also offers high quality packaging for its bulbs, and that they are dimmable
cons: Although rare, on occasion users received broken bulbs on arrival

customer_reviews.title: Warm and welcoming, great design... but mediocre Quality Control docks 2 stars for me...
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs look great... nice packaging, nice glass, nice design. The color is warm and welcoming. Not too warm but not too cold. The only problem is the quality control. I ordered two packs of these bulbs (8 bulbs total) and had 1 of the bulbs pop on the first power. None of the bulbs were handled with bare hands, they were all left in the bubble wrap when screwed into the sockets. I am working with Amazon for an easy replacement of the item. The other 7 bulbs worked fine so I just need a replacement bulb. Hopefully Amazon is accommodating and does not require me to return the item for a refund and re-purchase the item.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McClure

customer_reviews.title: Love that interesting filament!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bulbs. Like a few other vintage bulbs I tried, these too had some light marks on the glass - removable with a few swipes with a cloth. Another bulb I have tried recently were. While the Blaze Bulbs are cheaper, I have preferred these from G&B. The filament looks much more interesting on G&B with a zigzag wire as opposed to BB which are a thin, flat wire - only visible at a dimmed setting. Note that one bulb came in with a stem broken but bulb intact. TL;DR: Buy these for the smaller size and interesting filament if using a dimmed output setting.Otherwise, at max brightness, they perform just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Made for the Man Cave
customer_reviews.text: I put a couple old time pendent lights up in the Man Cave and used these bulbs. They look great and give off the light tint that I remember in my Grandfathers UPRR depot from when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Digger

customer_reviews.title: Warm color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light bulbs! Be sure you research the Kelvin rating on bulbs before you buy- I bought these to replace the first ones I bought that were very artificial and bright white. These are warm and give a nice glow to the room, whereas the previous were a blue-white. 2200 kelvin seems to be a natural level of warm vs cool.
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Make your home cosy with the twist of your wrist!
customer_reviews.text: In times of LEDs and non-incandescent light bulbs, my home started to look more like a hospital floor rather than a place of comfort. I had bought "warm" energy saving bulbs, but wasn't impressed. Then I got a vintage lightbulb from a major hardware store chain and was impressed with how soft and warm the light was. I wasn't impressed with the price though. When I found this offer I was elated. These are only the third of the price! Now all my rooms have warm and cosy light rather than harsh hospital light. I will definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: NYCflower

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking decorative bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: I shouldn't probably have docked a star for this as I knew these were decorative bulbs but they actually produce less light than anticipated. I have seen bulbs this style that do produce a bit more light. I have two directly over my stove and couldn't boil water without turning on another light. You remember those big colorful flashlights from childhood as they ran almost out of batteries? That's these bulbs. But otherwise they look nice and I'm keeping them for decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: vanity lighting situations~ absolutely love the warm
customer_reviews.text: I'm using 3 bulbs, each in 2 over -the -medicine -cabinet, vanity lighting situations~ absolutely love the warm, unharsh, ambient lighting! Plenty of light for shaving, make-up, etc., but yet, no shadows. I was very concerned about this, but it is not an issue! It's not an amber yellow light, but not a bright spot light either.....very happy with the appearance and lighting of these bulbs! :)
customer_reviews.author: CLuvr

customer_reviews.title: Just the perfect bulb for the new nautical copper lighting above our ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the perfect bulb for the new nautical copper lighting above our center island. I love the Edison type bulb. They make the fixtures look even more like a timepiece from a different age. They came well packed. I was a little concerned about them coming through the mail. They create a warm glow above our eating area. I love the clear glass which allows the filaments to be seen. I will certainly buy then again from the same vendor. Great job GORDON & BOND
customer_reviews.author: SkyBoss

customer_reviews.title: Vintage Bulb Renews Postlight
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased my first home and have been enjoying the process of making it my own! I have invested in some key pieces along for an added curb appeal; the postlight was a must and lighting quintessential. I chose the Edison Vintage Bulb, for its warm hues and aesthetics. I love it, especially since I personally installed the western bronze fixture onto its base. I was so excited to turn on the switch, and see if I had done it correctly... From the photos, so far so good, I also went with the 4 pack for its true value- thank you for carrying an assortment of different and your custoner service- it means everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome! And super affordable. I recently purchased a super cool like from Amazon and wanted to use Edison Bulbs for the light. I went to my local Home Depot where it was $10 for one bulb. ONE BULB! What? While stating in Home Depot, I ended up buying these on my phone and they came two days later (gotta love Prime). these were perfect for the shade and they worked with the dim-able switch. I will def buy more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley the Elley

customer_reviews.title: Love these bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect soft lighting I was looking for to put in my new glass pendant lights. They give off an amber light, so they're not bright even though labeled as 60W. I bought a different brand before these that were advertised as 60W vintage bulbs and were much too bright for my intended use - I was hesitant to try these but they're just what I was looking for. Competitively priced, packaged well and arrived quickly - gotta love Amazon. Great customer service too - appreciate the follow up emails!
customer_reviews.author: Firefly31

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful soft yellowish light
customer_reviews.text: Just the light I wanted for my new porch light. Like most people I think, I dislike the lifeless color/light of the new light bulbs. I am all for energy saving but I installed a stained glass porch light and I wanted a nice soft yellow light. These filled the bill exactly. Not sure how it measures up in the energy saving department and all that, but for this one particular application, it worked as I had hoped. Beautiful soft yellow light.
customer_reviews.author: EagleRock Dude

customer_reviews.title: ... I need a strong defined light but these are perfect when I want a mellower background light
customer_reviews.text: LEDs and CFL have their place when I need a strong defined light but these are perfect when I want a mellower background light. like when watching TV or on a computer. They look great when dimmed with the large visible filaments. In a lamp where you can't see the bulb I don't see a reason to spend the extra money on these over a everyday frosted 60w bulb, in a visible bulb vintage setup they totally rock.
customer_reviews.author: doghair

customer_reviews.title: Great Touch
customer_reviews.text: I love the combination of the vintage light fixture with the vintage Edison bulbs. Looks great, and the three different light brightness choices are perfect. I cannot comment on the longevity because it is brand new, but the insert with the bulbs says that just one bulb should last at least a year with limited use of about three hours a day. That works fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pat P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT LED
customer_reviews.text: This is my fault for not checking first but these bulbs give off yellow hues, not white. 2 lamps with these bulbs in them don't even light our 12x10 bedroom enough for me to be able to see without any other lights on. Also they are NOT LED and get super hot super quick so you can't leave them on for more than an hour. It sucks but I will be buying LED white-hue of these lights from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: These bulbs are exactly what I needed. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are exactly what I needed. They are a lovely touch to a handmade, reclaimed fixture I had made. Bulbs arrived quickly and perfectly intact. None broken, no issues. I will order from this supplier again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bulbs but packing might need upgrading
customer_reviews.text: These are really pretty, and they look great in my antique lighting fixtures. I ordered two packages, and I would have given them five stars, but one package had to be returned because one of the bulbs arrived broken and another one just didn't work. In looking at some of the other comments, it looks like others have had the same experience. Amazon made the return easy, and the replacement pack I got was fine. So, a nice product that might need just a bit more attention in the packaging department.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vintage bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These look great. I chose these bulbs because they are 2700 Kelvin, not 2200, which is much too yellow for my tastes. I am using them in the bathroom, 6 bulbs mounted upright in seeded glass globes and the light bounces off the ceiling for a wonderful soft glow that beautifully lights the room. The bulbs arrived intact and working, packaged snugly. I am about to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Create a historic look outside your house
customer_reviews.text: My house design is colonial-ish so putting these lights outside allowed me to create a more historic feeling outside at night. The one thing you need to realize about these old style bulbs is that they are warm tone and they don't go much higher than 60w or don't have your typical cool tone and bright feeling of like a regular 100w incandescent. My eye doctor has told me that warm spectrum light is healthier for you anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Hesed2020

customer_reviews.title: Interesting large light bulb
customer_reviews.text: Great looking light bulb, with or without a shade. Gives off a slightly amber light which adds to the vintage, steampunk look. I've only had it a week, so can't comment on longevity. Presentation and inner boxing is very well done as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these bulbs is outstanding. It is impossible to rate, with accuracy, the longevity of the bulbs as I have only had them for a few days but if they last as long as the overall quality of the product it will be great
customer_reviews.author: ArtistSB

customer_reviews.title: not painted amber like so many others
customer_reviews.text: Wrong description as of July 31 2018. Image in "Product Description" that says 2 5/8" wide by 5 1/2" high is for a ST64 light bulb! An ST58 light bulb is about 1/2" shorter in both height and width. Bulb glass is clear as stated in description, not painted amber like so many others. Light seems a bit cooler temperature than than 2700K listed.
customer_reviews.author: Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bulbs to go in a lamp made from vintage 2 quart canning jar. They were promptly shipped and arrived intact. Seller made contact to make sure I was pleased, etc but I waited until I had them in use a month or so before posting. I have connected 2 of these to a dimmer switch so the filaments can be more visible when I don't need the full 60W power. Would purchase again, and from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Wow, these are really bright!
customer_reviews.text: They deliver a bright, warm light that gives great illumination without being overly harsh. Dimmable is a big plus. Also, these bulbs give off a lot of heat, so make sure that your fabric or paper shades won't scorch. I'm using these in two glass-shaded torchieres and they look fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: Special, Vintage Look
customer_reviews.text: I bought some vintage looking light fixtures and these bulbs complete the look. Love them! We have two sconces for a vanity mirror in a restroom and two more sconces on two different walls. They add a lot of character.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful, unique light bulb. It starts with the packaging which is truly attractive. Then you open it and the bulb is just as beautiful. That's a strange word to use for a light bulb, but I have never seen such a unique bulb presentation. So far so good but I just got them so I can't vouch for longevity, but judging from everything else, I have high expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bettikins

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed in these Edison Bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on a Sunday sooner than I thought they would! Great packaging and even better product. Look like high quality bulb and all 3 of them worked perfectly right out of the box. Bubble wrap around bulb allows install while holding wrap and bulb so no finger prints are left on bulb. The wrap is short enough so stem can be spun into fixture. Great product, great follow from vendor, and fabulous looking!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ignitor

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on Eyes, Doesn't Emit a lot of EMF Radiation
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace compact fluorescent bulbs around the apartment. Incandescent light bulbs are gentler on the eyes and do not disrupt melatonin production for good quality sleep as much as light from compact fluorescent bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: David Wang

customer_reviews.title: Vintage  Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the light bulbs to add a little flair to my existing chandelier in the dining area. The bulbs are perfect for the chandelier. I removed the exiting globes for the bulbs to be seen. I'm now working on a wired typed globe for the bulbs to be seen. I've received many compliments thus far. Beautiful and will use the Edison type bulbs throughout the my home.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Arguini

customer_reviews.title: Bulb burned out within 3 hours of use
customer_reviews.text: The spectrum of light is great and the filament is cool but one bulb burned out within 3 hours of use. I'd return them but I'm hoping for Gordo and Bond to just send me a new bulb. I'll wait for their reply.
customer_reviews.author: T.BONE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bulbs that give off such a nice warm light.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bulbs. I had purchased other bulbs that were more "warm" and gave off more of an orange light -- which is nice too, but just not what I was looking for for this lamp. These are perfect. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PJWolf

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs arrived in perfect order and look great. Though we won't be using them in our new pendant lights for a couple of months we did test in a bedroom lamp. I liked the color. Didn't find to be orange.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrive perfect and well packaged.. I actually need to order more as I had bought some that had the amber color from another seller and they are too dark.. These white ones are EXACTLY what I needed and yes they are dimmable.. Thank you !!!
customer_reviews.author: twinmom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. And for a fraction of the cost at a local hardware store. Mr. Bezos: Please stay out of politics. Just continue to do what you do so well. And honor your employees. Treat them as you would want to be treated.
customer_reviews.author: Just My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY DIM.. Like 3 or 4 Candles.
customer_reviews.text: How can this be 60W when it's literally as bright as about 3 or 4 candles. I have lamp with no dimmer (full power), and it's ridiculously dim.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Potter

customer_reviews.title: The lights have a beautiful soft glow
customer_reviews.text: The lights have a beautiful soft glow, perfect for mood setting. Company has great customer service support. I contacted because 1 bulb went out within a week of installing, they replaced for me immediately. Will be purchasing my light bulbs from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, beautiful lighting, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! They arrived very quickly and are installed in our garden lights, they look amazing, very attractive, so much better than regular bulbs! I would highly recommend and will be purchasing more. Great customer service and follow up - very professional. Love the bulbs, wouldn't hesitate to recommend them, you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Would be great for another spot
customer_reviews.text: These lights were lovely and so well packaged. I ordered them for my bedside swing-arm lamps, they were a little too bright for this spot since they were so close to my eyes and not blocked by the shade. Would be great for another spot.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great Edison Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bulbs in good packaging. These bulbs have a nice amber glow and were delivered promptly. They are especially nice in pendant fixtures. We have purchased a number of them, including for our favorite bar/restaurant, and they are good, good, good.
customer_reviews.author: Dotter2010

customer_reviews.title: Love these bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs! I purchased for the three table lamps that I recently got- I looked everywhere for the perfect Edison bulbs and these ones are by far the best. Great quality, and I love the look! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: The lights are fine but one of the bulbs was defective when received
customer_reviews.text: The lights are fine but one of the bulbs was defective when received. I hadn't opened them until after the "return period" so unfortunately will get stuck with purchasing another box so I can have a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These lightbulbs are perfect for our newly renovated bathroom. Love them, except one has already burned out after only being used for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney S.

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it. It was very dim light, the bulb started to turn black after only a couple of days on. Returned asap.
customer_reviews.author: SlickRick

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs get dangerously hot. They actually left yellow burn marks on a freshly painted wall. I tried them in several fixtures once I discovered how hot they were and they still overheated no matter what fixture they were in. Fire hazard, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love that they aren’t LED!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights for my new dining room chandelier and they are perfect. Glad they are dimmable as using all 4 in the space is pretty bright. They give a nice yellow glow, unlike the harsh LED lights I tried first. Those got retuned for these and I’m glad I switched! I can’t speak to the longevity as I’ve had them for less than a week but so far, I give these lights 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay R.

customer_reviews.title: Get these bulbs because they work and look perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bulbs because they are great looking with the touch lamps I purchased. I’m glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeygal

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick, delivered promptly. Good price on a very nice item. Just as you'd like to expect. I use it for accent lighting in my office. They sort of, steal one's attention.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with these Edison bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with these Edison bulbs. They are of good quality and looks good. The light has a warm yellow glow and it is exactly what I was looking for. A bit smaller than I expected but it is my fault for not looking up the measurements before ordering. Uploaded pictures, one without light on and the other with light on but dimmed to show the inside of the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Nepu

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Love these but 1 out of the 4 showed up damaged. Need to replace only 1 but have to send all 4 back to replace....Boo!
customer_reviews.author: Danyel Mikesell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for clear glass shade
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I just switched my dated frosted glass shades for new clear glass but the traditional bulbs looked awful. I saw these and gave them a try. Wow! What a difference!! I highly recommend to anyone with clear shades.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Wojteczko

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I had a difficult time finding the right bulbs for my new outdoor wall sconces. I was happy to find the right size and shape Edison bulbs. These look beautiful and are perfect with my outdoor string lights. Also—priced right!
customer_reviews.author: Mombaum

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bulbs. They give off a very warm, soft light. Love the old school look. I used them in the lamps hanging over my island and also in my entryway.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Shipping disaster
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to use a totally shattered bulb. But the ones that weren't smashed are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Aleck

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs! Shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Great bulbs! Shipped fast, got them 2 days later and in perfect Condition . Well packaged for rough transit and every bulb works! They have a beautiful warm glow. We got the 60 watt and have 5 bulbs for a dino g room and is very well lit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good brightness and color
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use with a more rustic light fixture. They give off bright light and add a nice feel to the room. Haven't used them long enough to determine longevity.
customer_reviews.author: GatorGuy

customer_reviews.title: Character at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Building a new house and we wanted character. We bought these bulbs to go in some seed glass pendant light in the kitchen. Absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Great Large Addison bulbs... but check the size!
customer_reviews.text: Light bulbs are gorgeous... in hindsight I should have looked at the size but since I like them so much I used them for a ceiling fan that weren't originally their intended destination. Going through the collection of the seller I will definitely buy from then again.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: The light is a little more warm/yellow than I prefer, but the glass is clear and the light is much nicer than a typical incandescent bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Space Home Interiors

customer_reviews.title: Nice vintage lighting
customer_reviews.text: NIce glow and color vintage lights. Look great in my industrial style lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Mabrito

customer_reviews.title: quality and vintage
customer_reviews.text: The vintage bulbs displayed nice ambient yellow lighting but we will be returning them and ordering warm white lighting instead.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Very vintage & cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought the "clear" lights but they still have an amber glow. However, the light is soft & the bulbs are AWESOME looking. They also don't give off a lot of heat. We'll defiantly buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Bulb burnt out in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I know we bought these bulbs in September, however our new light fixture just went up 2 weeks ago and one of the bulbs already burnt out. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lights and make a perfect addition to the vintage lights I installed on the house thank you
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and warm color
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these LED bulbs. Fully dimmable down to the lowest of settings and they have a nice warm orange light like a real light bulb dimmed or a candle. Very retro and helps create a great ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal in NC

customer_reviews.title: They are just so vintage and cute
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs have such a WOW factor. They are just so different. I love them. BLO
customer_reviews.author: Betty Lou O'neill

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of these lights!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the vintage retro look and style of these bulbs. It dresses up any light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Zander

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect size and they arrived so fast!
customer_reviews.text: I have Edison bulbs around the house a lot, they cast such a nice glow. The steam punk look of our vintage lights call for these, i was glad they were a standard size nothing unusual and they all worked .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They look so vintage and give the room a great feel. Thank you for producing such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price and fast delivery!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! These lights are beautiful! I originally ordered a box for a DIY home decorating project of mine and then decided to do something similar at work so I ordered a second box. Coworkers all loved them as well so I ordered a third box to give as part of my Secret Santa gift exchange happening this week. All three transactions were equally a great experience... Great product, exactly as described, arrived in perfect condition with speedy same day delivery.👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Brent Radliff

customer_reviews.title: super cool bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Long-lasting, very cool lighting and perfect for our half bath!
customer_reviews.author: BusyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Vintage edison lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: Just got these to use in my ceiling fan. They cast a warm glow yet are pretty bright.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J Dyer

customer_reviews.title: One bulb burned out within a couple hours
customer_reviews.text: Other than one out of four not working, the bulbs are OK so far. the bulbs are completely clear when turned off. I have others who have a slight amber bulb when unplugged. I like the amber better for naked bulb lamp designs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant glow!  Dimmable and pleasurable warm light!
customer_reviews.text: I have opened and tested one of the bulbs and it glows brilliantly. My plan will be to install a vintage pendant cord fixture and use three of these very cool ligtbulbs. Cannot wait to test it out on this weekend. Douglas
customer_reviews.author: douglas s wittnebel

customer_reviews.title: Edison light bulbs nice but not enough light
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these light bulbs. Perfect for the light we purchased. However with (3) 60 watts bulbs I thought it would be brighter than it is. Will still recommend them though.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ann Mclain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and cool
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are so cool it's hard not to stare right at the beautiful inner workings, as they are like tiny little scuptures. Just do your staring while they are off! The bulbs are awesome, and put off a bright light that is warm and pretty. They arrived fast and were well packaged in a cute little box. We are using them in our newly remodeling bathroom. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Steph H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and just enough light. Used these and switched out the other Edison bulbs that had a yellow hue to them, these are much better! You can see the exposed filaments better on these bulbs
customer_reviews.author: K. A.

customer_reviews.title: Too dim
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were brighter. Too dim for a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nomo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bulb that last a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bulbs. There is no yellow tint on the bulb like some others, I have had this light bulb in since June 2018! And now it is April 2019 and haven’t had to change it yet. They are a bit more expensive than other brands, but it is worth it for the quality. They aren’t super bright but I am okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Swint

customer_reviews.title: Warm light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would match chandelier bulbs from the same company. However these are much warmer and not as bright. But I'm still happy with the bulbs
customer_reviews.author: TS Francis

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs work perfectly in our 8 light fixture. They dim to a warm glow that we love. Arrived in perfect condition due to good packing will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: catlady

customer_reviews.title: Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I have only just started using these bulbs so I don't know about their longevity. The order was filled promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Owens

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bulbs. They give plenty of light, don't be discouraged. (We do have 4 in a row in case your concern is the brightness.) They give off a warm romantic light.
customer_reviews.author: twash

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Has an orange glow. Nice for dining, not for reading.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Like Warm and cozy??
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these bulbs. They create a warm golden light that allows your eyes to relax at the end of a long day. I live in an old farmhouse originally built in 1905. So the old fashioned bulbs feel at home here. Thanks for a marvelous gift to pur home.
customer_reviews.author: Lesliann

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!
customer_reviews.text: These are so hot my wall was heating up. Our electrician said it could easily start a fire
customer_reviews.author: pamela hammond

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement to what came with my light fixture. The tint was much lighter than the original bulbs which I prefer since it is over a bathroom sink and mirror. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori in California

customer_reviews.title: It takes several lights in the room for maximum light.
customer_reviews.text: They are in the lights in my kitchen and it is a warm glow of light. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Kelley Minor

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Quantity and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Came in a good design package and bright for a nice vintage lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: beautiful light
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for anyone who wants old look of a bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Very Aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs were just what I wanted. I love that look of the Industrial Age.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Bright and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are bright and beautiful. 60 watts gives off lots of light. The dimmer feature gives them a candlelight glow. Adds so much to my kitchen and dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Light my fire
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs give off an amazing soft & sexy light. It's so warm and feels so soft.
customer_reviews.author: mdhomes

customer_reviews.title: Vintage lighting is the New!
customer_reviews.text: Looking good, had trouble finding 5 of these at Target and Home Depot so ordered from amazon. Came on time and look nice!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs, bright
customer_reviews.text: A lot lighter than I was expecting. One of the bulbs had a bunch of brown spotting in the bottom of the bulb. Not sure if this was on the inside or outside of the bulb. The bulbs are really bright which is great. Haven’t opened the other 2 bulbs yet so we will see if those are alright. Great bulbs either way just some spotting that wouldn’t come off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and warm light from THE ONE unbroken bulb out of a box of four!!! Please, these are not cheap. I expect them to at least show up intact. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful look
customer_reviews.text: Put another bulb in the fixture, too bright...this one is perfect and the old world accent is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: eelzemog

customer_reviews.title: Bulb works fine but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Two of the four bulbs were broken when I opened the package. A third broke trying to get it out of its very tight individual box. I managed to get the fourth out in one piece. Since I only needed one and they were cheap I didn’t return them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid these would not be bright enough but they are super bright and I am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna

customer_reviews.title: Oops...wrong bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Wrong bulbs. I have to return them. Also, I decided not to get the light fixture I would use these bulbs in.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy C

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Kind of an orangish light not super bright. But pretty cool looking I like them
customer_reviews.author: jessie nick

product_meta.title: Vintage Edison Light Bulb 60W (4 Pack) - Dimmable Exposed Filament - Incandescent Clear ST58 Teardrop Squirrel Cage Style - E26 Medium Base 2700K - 210 Lumens (4 Pack)
feature_bullets: ✅ QUALITY 4 PACK: A very highly quality 4 pack of Vintage Edison Light Bulb. These traditional edison bulbs are ST58 teardrop antique looking "Squirrel Cage" exposed filament light bulbs.
✅ STYLISH EFFECT: These 60 watts, 210 lumen, Incandescent Light Bulbs have a warm Color Temperature of approximately 2700K
✅ STANDARD FIT: Their medium (E26) base ensures use in everyday lamps and fixtures. They are the perfect lightbulbs for that vintage, retro, nostalgic, edison look.
✅ DIMMABLE: These vintage edison light bulbs from Gordon & Bond have dimmable exposed filament so you can create the perfect ambiance.
✅ PEACE OF MIND - If you have any issues with your order we'll respond within 12 hours to make it right, plus all our Vintage Lightbulbs come with a 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE so buy with confidence.
